name: AJEnglish
text:
1-Nehru's 1959 Beijing visit

India inherited its border dispute with China from its British colonial rulers who set the boundary in 1914. When India questioned boundaries shown on Chinese official maps, China rejected the colonial frontier https://t.co/HOvEdh5JbH

name: AJEnglish
text:
2-1962 Sino-Indian War

Chinese troops crossed the frontier during a dispute over the border's demarcation, sparking a 4-week war that killed thousands of Indians. China withdrew but kept Aksai Chin, a strategic corridor linking Tibet to western China https://t.co/HOvEdh5JbH
